languages.text: "Однажды... да, элантах. Изгнание на многое раскрыло мне глаза, но Путь Изгоя давно тяготит мое сердце. Я думаю... что отчетливо вижу свой новый путь. Он поет мне, зовет вперед — Путь Воина. Защитника тех, кого раньше я не могла спасти. То, что я узнала о мире, о людях, о тебе... Я привнесу в свою новую жизнь. И в жизни своих собратьев".

"Some day they will, elantach. Exile opened my eyes to many things, but the Path of the Outcast weighs heavily on my heart. I think... that I see my new Path clearly now. It sings to me, calling me forward — the Path of the Warrior, the protector of those I could not save before. All that I have learned about the world, about humans, about you... I will take this knowledge into my new life. And into the lives of my kin."
languages.original_text: "Однажды... да, элантах. Изгнание на многое раскрыло мне глаза, но Путь Изгоя давно тяготит мое сердце. Я думаю... что отчетливо вижу свой новый путь. Он поет мне, зовет вперед — Путь Воина. Защитника тех, кого раньше я не могла спасти. То, что я узнала о мире, о людях, о тебе... Я привнесу в свою новую жизнь. И в жизни своих собратьев".

It sings to me, calling me forward — the Path of the Warrior, protector of those I could not save before. All that I learned about the world, about the humans, about you... I will take this knowledge into my new life. And into the lives of my kinsmen."

languages.text: “总有一天，我们会分道扬镳，外界人。这场流放之旅让我看到了很多东西，但流浪者的道途沉重地压在我的心上。我想……我已经可以很清楚地看到新的道途了。那是战士的道途，它在向我歌唱，在呼唤我前进，要我拯救我未能拯救的人们。我对这个世界、对人类、对你的了解……我会用这些知识指引我新的生活，指引我族人的生活。”
languages.original_text: "Some day they will, elantach. Exile opened my eyes to many things, but the Path of the Outcast weighs heavily on my heart. I think... that I see my new Path clearly now. It sings to me, calling me forward — the Path of the Warrior, the protector of those I could not save before. All that I have learned about the world, about humans, about you... I will take this knowledge into my new life. And into the lives of my kin."

traits.locale_text: “总有一天，我们会分道扬镳，外界人。这场流放之旅让我看到了很多东西，但流浪者的道途沉重地压在我的心上。我想……我已经可以很清楚地看到新的道途了。那是战士的道途，它在向我歌唱，在呼唤我前进，要我拯救我未能拯救的人们。我对这个世界、对人类、对你的了解……我会用这些知识指引我新的生活，指引我族人的生活。”

languages.text: «Algún día, elantach. El exilio me ha abierto los ojos a muchas cosas, pero la Senda del Proscrito conlleva una gran carga para mi corazón. Creo... creo que ahora puedo ver una nueva Senda con claridad. Me canta, invitándome a seguirla: es la Senda del Guerrero, para proteger a quienes no pude salvar antes. Todo lo que he descubierto sobre la galaxia, sobre los humanos, sobre ti... me acompañará a mi nueva vida. Y así, también llegará a las vidas de mis hermanos».
languages.original_text: "Some day they will, elantach. Exile opened my eyes to many things, but the Path of the Outcast weighs heavily on my heart. I think... that I see my new Path clearly now. It sings to me, calling me forward — the Path of the Warrior, the protector of those I could not save before. All that I have learned about the world, about humans, about you... I will take this knowledge into my new life. And into the lives of my kin."

traits.locale_text: «Algún día, elantach. El exilio me ha abierto los ojos a muchas cosas, pero la Senda del Proscrito conlleva una gran carga para mi corazón. Creo... creo que ahora puedo ver una nueva Senda con claridad. Me canta, invitándome a seguirla: es la Senda del Guerrero, para proteger a quienes no pude salvar antes. Todo lo que he descubierto sobre la galaxia, sobre los humanos, sobre ti... me acompañará a mi nueva vida. Y así, también llegará a las vidas de mis hermanos».

languages.text: 「いつかはそうなる、エランタ。追放は多くのことを気づかせてくれたが、追放者の道は我の心に重くのしかかっている。我が思うに…今、進むべき新しい道がはっきりと見えているのだ。それは我に歌いかけ、前進するよう呼びかけている…戦士の道を、かつての我が救えなかった人々を守る者の道へと。我がこの世界について、人間について、お前について学んだことを…すべて新しい人生に活かそう。そして我が同胞の人生にも」
languages.original_text: "Some day they will, elantach. Exile opened my eyes to many things, but the Path of the Outcast weighs heavily on my heart. I think... that I see my new Path clearly now. It sings to me, calling me forward — the Path of the Warrior, the protector of those I could not save before. All that I have learned about the world, about humans, about you... I will take this knowledge into my new life. And into the lives of my kin."

traits.locale_text: 「いつかはそうなる、エランタ。追放は多くのことを気づかせてくれたが、追放者の道は我の心に重くのしかかっている。我が思うに…今、進むべき新しい道がはっきりと見えているのだ。それは我に歌いかけ、前進するよう呼びかけている…戦士の道を、かつての我が救えなかった人々を守る者の道へと。我がこの世界について、人間について、お前について学んだことを…すべて新しい人生に活かそう。そして我が同胞の人生にも」

languages.text: "Eines Tages, Elantach. Das Exil hat mir in vielerlei Hinsicht die Augen geöffnet, doch der Pfad des Ausgestoßenen liegt schwer auf meinem Herzen. Ich glaube ... dass ich meinen neuen Pfad jetzt klar sehe. Er singt für mich, er ruft mich — der Pfad des Kriegers, des Beschützers derer, die ich zuvor nicht retten konnte. Alles, was ich über die Welt gelernt habe, über Menschen, über Euch ... All dieses Wissen werde ich in mein neues Leben mitnehmen. Und in das Leben meines Volkes."
languages.original_text: "Some day they will, elantach. Exile opened my eyes to many things, but the Path of the Outcast weighs heavily on my heart. I think... that I see my new Path clearly now. It sings to me, calling me forward — the Path of the Warrior, the protector of those I could not save before. All that I have learned about the world, about humans, about you... I will take this knowledge into my new life. And into the lives of my kin."

traits.locale_text: "Eines Tages, Elantach. Das Exil hat mir in vielerlei Hinsicht die Augen geöffnet, doch der Pfad des Ausgestoßenen liegt schwer auf meinem Herzen. Ich glaube ... dass ich meinen neuen Pfad jetzt klar sehe. Er singt für mich, er ruft mich — der Pfad des Kriegers, des Beschützers derer, die ich zuvor nicht retten konnte. Alles, was ich über die Welt gelernt habe, über Menschen, über Euch ... All dieses Wissen werde ich in mein neues Leben mitnehmen. Und in das Leben meines Volkes."

languages.text: « Tôt ou tard, c'est inévitable, elantach. Si l'exil m'a ouvert les yeux sur bon nombre de choses, la Voie de l'Errance pèse lourdement sur mon cœur. Je crois... que je distingue clairement ma nouvelle vocation, à présent. Elle chante à mes oreilles, elle m'invite à aller de l'avant... à suivre la Voie du Guerrier, afin de protéger ceux que je n'ai pas pu sauver autrefois. Tout ce que j'ai appris sur ce monde, sur les humains, sur vous... Je mettrai ces connaissances au service de ma nouvelle vie, et de celle des miens. »
languages.original_text: "Some day they will, elantach. Exile opened my eyes to many things, but the Path of the Outcast weighs heavily on my heart. I think... that I see my new Path clearly now. It sings to me, calling me forward — the Path of the Warrior, the protector of those I could not save before. All that I have learned about the world, about humans, about you... I will take this knowledge into my new life. And into the lives of my kin."

Elle chante à mes oreilles, elle m'invite à aller de l'avant... à suivre la Voie du Guerrier, afin de protéger ceux que je n'ai pas pu sauver autrefois. languages.text: "Bir gün ayrı düşecekler elantach. Sürgün birçok konuda gözlerimi açmamı sağladı ancak Yurtsuzun Yolu, kalbimde büyük bir ağırlığa sahip. Sanıyorum... Yeni Yolumu artık net bir şekilde görebiliyorum. Bana şarkılar söylüyor, beni yanına çağırıyor: Savaşçının Yolu, öncesinde kurtaramadıklarımın koruyuculuğu. Dünya hakkında, insanlar hakkında, senin hakkında öğrendiğim her şey... Bu bilgiyi alıp yeni yaşamıma taşıyacağım. Soydaşlarımın yaşamına da."
languages.original_text: "Some day they will, elantach. Exile opened my eyes to many things, but the Path of the Outcast weighs heavily on my heart. I think... that I see my new Path clearly now. It sings to me, calling me forward — the Path of the Warrior, the protector of those I could not save before. All that I have learned about the world, about humans, about you... I will take this knowledge into my new life. And into the lives of my kin."
